column4: im having trouble with ubuntu... im trying to open my other harddrive wich i have in my computer but i dont know how i should open it... help?
do you know the dev "address" of your hd? like hda or hdb?
do "sudo fdisk /dev/hdc" and then press l
it will just do a harmless list of current partitions
then press q to exit without "formatting" or changing anything
and then under "System" it will say  HPFS/NTFS
and after all that do "sudo mount /mnt/windrive"
that sucks, try "sudo ls /mnt/windrive/" to see if its working, and then ask someone else in the channel how to change permissions
